properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: c1
v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Prabhuvaa yerigitini lokamantha mosamani choopitivi Samaadhaana nireekshana naakilalo kruthajnatha Kaligi (2) neevaipe choochedanu neeyande nilichi Yundi nee yaajnala paalintunu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Naa mundu nadiche prabhoo ninnu vembadinchedanu Neevu naa thoda nunda marichedanu dukhamunu Nemmadini pondiyila (2) kanneeru kaarchanika Neeve naa sarvamani nee yande balapadeda{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yesuni siluva joochi vijayamunu pondedanu Sahintunu santasamuga nee koraku annintini Ninnu ne nammedanu (2) neetone saagedanu Nee rekkala chaatu ne nunda bhayapadanu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Marana nadi yoddaku santasamuga vachedanu Mrutyuvu baari nundi jeevamunaku daatintuvu Rakshakuni choochedanu (2) nannaayana cherchukonun Thakshaname thana roopamunaku maarpu chendedanu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Agamya jyoti yandu ghanamuga ne praveshinchi dootalu, Parishudhulu, bhakhtulane choochedanu Ne santasinchedanu (2) prabhuvu thoda nundedanu Nireekshana idiye aayanatho ne nundunu{/lang-eng}
